things.thing

Class ThingControlReactive

  • java.lang.Object
    • things.thing.ThingControlMinimal
      • things.thing.ThingControlReactive
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ThingControl

    public class ThingControlReactive
extends ThingControlMinimal

    Convenience class that extends ThingControl and adds some convenience methods for (mostly) query purposes.

    Note that all of those methods return Observables (also, the start with ‘observe*’, opposed to ‘get*’ for the methods in ThingControl), which can be used to chain filters and additional queries together.

    For more details about the overall workings of this class check out ThingControl.
